Header: SFHQ-J Supports Commemorative 'Pinkama' at Sri Naga Vihara
Content: Troops of the Security Force Headquarters-Jaffna (SFHQ-J) extended their full cooperation for conduct of the one-year commemoration ceremony of the former incumbent at Jaffna Sri Naga Viharaya, Ven Meegahajandure Gnanaratana Nayake Thero, held at the Sri Naga Viharaya premises in the Jaffna town on Tuesday (18). Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi, Commander Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J) as the Chief Guest for the all-night Pirith chanting ceremony offered the traditional tray of betel and invited the monks to commence chanting, An alms-giving on the following day (19) culminated the commemorative ceremony.
